title: Motorolaâ€™s latest budget phone packs a 90Hz AMOLED display and a 50MP main camera
content:
Following multiple leaks, Motorola’s new Moto G52 smartphone is now official. The new model succeeds last year’s Moto G51 and offers several notable upgrades, including a faster chipset, a better display, faster charging, and more. Moto G52: Specifications Specification Moto G52 Dimensions and Weight 160.98 x 74.46 x 7.99mm 169g Display 6.6-inch AMOLED FHD+ (2400

The post Motorola’s latest budget phone packs a 90Hz AMOLED display and a 50MP main camera appeared first on xda-developers.
description: The Moto G52 is officially here. It packs a 6.6-inch AMOLED display, Snapdragon 680 SoC, a 50MP main camera and 5,000mAh battery.
